title: Your Laugh
description: The way your entire face lights up when you genuinely laugh. It's the most beautiful sound in the world, and it never fails to make my heart skip a beat.

title: Your Kindness
description: You have this incredible ability to make everyone feel seen and valued. Your empathy and compassion are truly rare gifts.

title: Your Strength
description: The quiet resilience you carry. You face challenges with such grace and determination. You inspire me every single day.
